name: Application Load Balancer
description: Provisions an Application Load Balancer (ALB) with a listener and target group in public subnets.

inputs.name: vpc_id
inputs.description: The VPC ID where the ALB will be deployed.
inputs.label: VPC ID

inputs.name: public_subnets
inputs.description: List of public subnet IDs where the ALB will listen for traffic.
inputs.label: Public Subnets

inputs.name: project_name
inputs.description: Project name used for resource tagging.
inputs.label: Project Name

inputs.name: lb_port
inputs.description: The port the Load Balancer listens on (Default: 80).
inputs.label: Listener Port

outputs.name: target_group_arn
outputs.description: The ARN of the Target Group (Connect this to your Compute/ASG).

outputs.name: alb_security_group_id
outputs.description: The Security Group ID of the ALB (Use this to secure your backend).

outputs.name: alb_dns_name
outputs.description: The public DNS name of the Load Balancer.
